meta_description: Established in 1916, the Columbia County Historical Society collects, preserves, interprets, and shares the history and culture of Columbia County, New York.
hours_text:
# Our Sites

Our historic sites in Kinderhook, NY are windows into many aspects of Columbia County’s history, through architecture as well as rotating [exhibits](https://cchsny.org/explore/exhibitions-events/). Learn about our properties and start planning your next visit.

## Kinderhook Village

[](https://cchsny.org/visit/museum-library/)

###  [ Museum & Library ](https://cchsny.org/visit/museum-library/)

Located in an early 20th-century masonic temple, the CCHS Museum & Library is home to multiple exhibition galleries and an extensive archive of Columbia County history.

[ View Site » ](https://cchsny.org/visit/museum-library/)

[](https://cchsny.org/visit/james-vanderpoel-house/)

###  [ James Vanderpoel House ](https://cchsny.org/visit/james-vanderpoel-house/)

Tour this elegant historic house in Kinderhook, NY, built circa-1820 in the Federal style for Judge James Vanderpoel.

[ View Site » ](https://cchsny.org/visit/james-vanderpoel-house/)

## Rural Properties

[](https://cchsny.org/visit/luykas-van-alen-house/)

###  [ Luykas Van Alen House ](https://cchsny.org/visit/luykas-van-alen-house/)

The 1737 Luykas Van Alen House in Kinderhook, NY is recognized as one of the best remaining examples of a Dutch Colonial farmhouse in the Hudson Valley.

[ View Site » ](https://cchsny.org/visit/luykas-van-alen-house/)

[](https://cchsny.org/visit/ichabod-crane-schoolhouse/)

###  [ Ichabod Crane Schoolhouse ](https://cchsny.org/visit/ichabod-crane-schoolhouse/)

Visit this c. ...

collections_text:
# Rediscover History

Columbia County Historical Society

# What's on this fall

[ Exhibitions ](https://cchsny.org/explore/exhibitions/)

[ Our sites ](https://cchsny.org/visit/)

[ Mercantile  ](https://cchsny.org/store/)

### Lynn Strunk Memorial Tea Party

Sunday, November 16, 2-4pm – in the newly reinstalled Vanderpoel House Museum, space will be limited, reserve your seat soon! $50 per person. Call 518 758-9265.

[ Download PDF Flyer ](https://cchsny.org/wp-content/uploads/2025/10/LynnStrunkMemorialTeaParty.pdf)

[ Purchase Tickets ](https://cchsny.org/product/lynn-strunk-memorial-tea-party/)

### 2025 Annual Appeal

Your generosity supports our mission to preserve, interpret, and present the history and culture of Columbia County, NY.

[ DONATE NOW ](https://cchsny.org/support/annual-appeal-2025/)

### 39th Annual Gallery of Wreaths

A Silent Auction to Benefit the Columbia County Historical Society​. December 5 – December 7, 2025​. James Vanderpoel House​

[ Learn More ](https://cchsny.org/gallery-of-wreaths)

_Celebrating 100 Years of Stewardship._

### First Columbians 2025

Thank you to all who supported our annual fundraiser, First Columbians. We had a beautiful night on the rear lawn of the Vanderpoel House of History, celebrating 100 years of stewardship of this magnificent property. 

The Columbia County Historical Society collects, preserves, interprets and shares the history and culture of Columbia County, New York.
